**Action requested regarding your FEGA Sweden submission**

Dear Researcher,

We are contacting you regarding your submission request in FEGA Sweden \[add Redmine issue number\], for which we have been waiting for your response. As you may recall, we reached out some months ago to inform you that FEGA Sweden is now fully operational and that we can assist you with the deposition of your sensitive human research data.

To keep our records accurate, we kindly ask you to let us know whether you are still interested in proceeding with your submission.

* If you intend to **submit your data**–now or at a later stage–please confirm this by replying to this email **within one week**. We will then keep your case open in our system.  
* If you are **no longer interested**, please let us know, and we will close the issue on our side.  
* If **we do not receive a reply** within one week, we will assume that there is currently no interest and will close your issue accordingly.

Should you wish to proceed with your submission in the future, you are very welcome to **contact us again** at [fega-sweden@nbis.se](mailto:fega-sweden@nbis.se)**.** In case your issue has been closed, we can easily reopen it and continue working with your submission**,** provided it concerns the same data.

You are always welcome to **register a new submission request** in FEGA Sweden if you wish to deposit new data: [https://fega.nbis.se/submission/submission-request.html](https://fega.nbis.se/submission/submission-request.html)

Thank you very much for your understanding and cooperation.

Best regards,

The FEGA Sweden Helpdesk Team
